Job Description: Role Overview      The Development Consultant (XStore) is responsible for providing software technical product knowledge and retail industry knowledge in order to facilitate the successful enhancement of our Stores projects. The successful candidate will have experience XStore/Micros/Stores functions.      Essential Duties and Responsibilities:       Review and conduct information systems need assessment and recommend appropriate infrastructure solution       Design and implement applications and enhancements using JAVA code       Maintain and enhance applications per client request       Assist with defining and implementing regression test suites       Frequently analyze and define client data conversion, interface, and application enhancement requirements       Translate business requirements into technical solutions       Establish and monitor systems support and development in a Micros environment       Perform application enhancements and modifications, while mentoring and teaching other consultants       Facilitate the logging, reporting, and resolution of application issues as needed       Participate in supporting production environment as necessary       Regularly assist in the definition of implementation and integration alternatives       Intermittently perform go-live assessments to determine the readiness of the system as well as client and support teams       Often provide knowledge transfer to necessary 3rd party vendors (hardware, software, etc) related to Oracle Retail and OLR applications and requirements       Education and Experience:       Bachelors degree in Computer Science or related field or 3+ years of related experience       Prior to Micros/Stores/POS implementation experience       4+ years development and/or systems integration experience preferred       4+ years in the Retail industry or an associated Retail IT field preferred       Previous consulting experience preferred
